# Read App Info Information

**Web Service Endpoint**

Read App Store information including your App Store state, age ratings, Brazil age rating, and kids’ age band.

## Discussion

For request and response examples for reading an age rating declaration, see [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appInfos-_id_-ageRatingDeclaration].

## Reading App Information

- **List All App Infos for an App**: Get information about an app that is currently live on App Store, or that goes live with the next version.
- **List All App Info Localizations for an App Info**: Get a list of localized, app-level information for an app.
